metadata.Title: CVE-2020-14403 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in LibVNCServer before 0.9.13. libvncserver/hextile.c allows out-of-bounds access via encodings.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-14403` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvncclient1 - 0.9.10+dfsg-3ubuntu0.16.04.5
libvncserver-config - 0.9.10+dfsg-3ubuntu0.16.04.5
libvncserver1 - 0.9.10+dfsg-3ubuntu0.16.04.5
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

vino - 3.8.1-0ubuntu9.3
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libvncserver package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.9.10+dfsg-3ubuntu0.16.04.5').
vino package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.8.1-0ubuntu9.3').
x11vnc package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
